Articles.Content:
Yes, this is the thread! The thread to rule them all! So yeah, this is where the guys from Pancake Aero discuss and plan the laythe mission! Ready, set, laythe!

- - - Updated - - -

PLANNING GOES HERE

Stage One: Build a lifter, transfer stage, and habitation module. We MAY use Modular Kolonisation, since it's basically built for this. After the crafts are built, we send out two seperate crafts: The hab unit, with supplies and solar panels, and the lander that carries the kerbals.

Are we doing is in dark multiplayer?

ALL GO OPERATION MUTE CACTUS

yeah were doing this in dmp so were going to have to wait and get the server setup.
Does it need port forwarding and a configured run.bat and stuff?

no the download is actually quiet simple.

just download the mod then put it into your game data.

i think on the mod website there is a tutorial on how to make a server.

MODS

DMP(obviously)

Firespitter

Hooligan Lab Balloons

KAS

Modular Colonisation

HyperEdit (building purposes)

- - - Updated - - -

no the download is actually quiet simple.

just download the mod then put it into your game data.

i think on the mod website there is a tutorial on how to make a server.

I know how to install mods, I meant to make the server.

Guys, my CPU won't work with Firespitter and Modular Colonization... Sorry

- - - Updated - - -

I am on DMP who is setting up the server and how can I join?

- - - Updated - - -

Anyone? (10chars)
Wat do you mean your CPU won't handle it? I am using a $200 laptop and it works just fine for me.
No, it does not work for me, even if I follow the instructions. Have you guys set up the DMP server?
I'm working off an ipad atm, the earliest I can get on is around 4 central time

ill be able to hop on around 4:45 - 5:10 (also in central)

- - - Updated - - -

No, it does not work for me, even if I follow the instructions. Have you guys set up the DMP server?

you trying to setup a server or join a server? because to join a server you need to go the public server list and enter it in.
If Dmp dosen't work we could always do the ol' save file swap

Ok, i'll have to sign off for the night, and I am using my iPod because my Cpu went down. Still trying to solve the problem. It went down in the middle of a DMP launch. I got it to work, but can someone else make the server tonight.

Please can it only be:

Stock

KAS

and Hyperedit.

Thanks, and good luck joining.

-DMSP

ive started our save for us to use well just trade it off when another person needs it to use.

i guess ill pick the landing site.

should i aim for a beach area or further inland?

gave up on the landing after multiple failed attempts.

then decided to work on a little plane

i have no idea what to call it but the thing is really usefull. it carries 2 kerbals and if i put stronger engines on ti it could probobally carry a larger load.

how do i post pictures?

Edited January 17, 2015 by jman508
INACCEPTBLE SPELLING. (pure skillz)

jman, i'm back, but before you do anything, can you turn it into a DMP server?

- - - Updated - - -

I already have a Laythe direct landing zone. Please make the DMP server have KAS, Stock and Hyperedit.

Call it: Laythe Race!
ill go through the website and see if i can start it.

ugh i cant find how tooo.

and if im missing it im not that suprised.

im not even that tech savy.
